tech_news.title: The M4 MacBook Air is one of the best Apple deals you can get for Black Friday - The Verge
tech_news.description: The 13-inch M4 MacBook Air is on sale at multiple retailers for $749 for Black Friday, which remains its lowest price to date. The 15-inch model is on sale, too.
